item.title: They Can't Make A Coward Out of Me!
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (George Creel)
item.description: All that Dr.Â Hyde suffered during his trials was as nothing to the years of heartbreak that followed his acquittal. He who had been in Hell was forced to plumb new and deeper Hells.
